messages.400: Yo, you sent some bad data, bitch!
messages.401: You ain't authorized for this, bitch!
messages.404: Can't find that page anywhere, bitch!
messages.410: That page is gone forever, bitch!

descriptions.400: Check your inputs, yo. Something's whack.
descriptions.401: You need the right credentials and stuff.
descriptions.403: Yo, you can't access this. Period.
descriptions.404: Looked everywhere for that page. It's gone, yo.
